      Home Details for 24 Franklin Ct

      2 Days on Trulia
      Unique 55+ community in excellent location. Elegantly appointed apartment with columns, trey ceilings & 2 ensuite Bedrooms. Penthouse Madison model is an end unit with no neighbors above or below. Private wooded views from every window in this desirable cul de sac location. Spacious Kitchen with granite & stainless steel. Gas fireplace in formal Living Room & slider to covered balcony off the Dining Room. Gracious Master Bedroom suite features large walkin closet & full bath w whirlpool & tiled stall shower. Private basement storage & private 2 car garage. Beautiful clubhouse w social h...all, billiard room, exercise room & his/hers locker rooms. Inground pool, putting green & bocce. Many social clubs for those that are interested. 1hr to NYC!
      Show more

      Listing Provided by

      Jill Wolowitz, Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New England Properties , (203) 426-8426

      Agent Phone: (203) 733-2198

      This property located at 24 Franklin Ct, Newtown CT, 06470 is currently for sale and has been listed on Trulia for 2 days. This property is listed by Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices New England Properties for $445,000. 24 Franklin Ct has 2 beds, 2 ½ baths, and approximately 1,940 square feet. The property was built in 2004. 24 Franklin Ct is in Newtown and in ZIP Code 06470. The list price of $445,000 is 16% lower than the average list price of $527,229 for 06470 real estate and 16% lower than the average list price of $527,229 for Newtown, CT real estate. The price for this property is 10% higher than the average sales price of $404,931 for 06470 and 10% higher than the average sales price of $404,931 for Newtown. The price per square foot for this property is $229, which is 33% higher than the average of $173 for 06470, and 33% higher than the average of $173 for Newtown.
